Site analysis (model calibration): In this step, observed daily weather data from 1976 to 2005 (30 years) recorded in Qom synoptic stations was first used to calculate their statistical parameters. These parameters were applied by LARS-WG in next step to generate synthetic data series. The Kolmogorov-Smirnov (K-S) were used to determine the best copula fitting to data, t-test for monthly means, and F-test for standard deviation [ 34].
